name: Royal Square at Novena and Royal Square Medical Centre

reviews.text: Royal Square Medical Centre / Royal Square at Novena is conveniently located just a short walk out of Novena MRT station on the North South Line, just look for exit B. Lots of medical related clinics here ok the medical tower side. Lots of eateries on the ground floor too. Has its own parking which is super convenient. Will be back!

This two malls connected, Royal square and Novena, this place big improvement in front right now still under construction underground, business around this area are good, 3 malls connected, Royal square, Novena the oldest of them and Velo City, the green color building, over bridge connecting to Goldhill shopping Center

Surprisingly delightful experience at Lotus plant-based Chinese Restaurant. Quality and presentation of all the dishes ordered were beyond my expectations. No, the bill did not hit a hole in my pocket as it was reasonably priced. A good place to impress your in-laws who would like to try vegetarian food at affordable prices in quite- a- cozy restaurant.

‚óè My photos were taken both at daytime & night time. It was a heavy stormy day today when we went out to Novena area.
Very nice and pleasant shopping center to visit. Mountain Elizabeth Hospital is just next door. MRT station is very convenient too.
